musteri_kaydi_yapilirken_hata_olustu_tek: An error occurred while registering the customer, try again...
bu_isimle_kayitli_bir_musteri_bulunmakta: There is a customer registered with this name.
gecerli_bir_email_adresi_girin: Please enter a valid email address.
alanlari_dogru_doldurdugunuzdan_emin_olu: Make sure you fill in the fields correctly.
bu_alici_silinecek_onayliyor_musun: This recipient will be deleted, confirm ?
bos_fatura_olusturulamaz_urun_girin: Cannot create blank invoice, enter product...
fatura_silinecek_onayliyor_musunuz: Do you confirm that the invoice will be deleted ?
mail_gonderilirken_hata_olustu_daha_sonr: There was an error sending the mail, try again later.
mail_dogrulama_istek_mesaji: Account verification is required to log in to the app. See the email sent for account verification.
sifre_en_az_6_karakter_olmali: The password should be 6 characters at least.
ilk_giris_mesaji: Since it is your first login, you must save your company information and login information for once to be used in invoices !
bu_mail_adresi_ile_daha_once_kayit_olust: This e-mail address has already been registered...
bir_hata_olustu_daha_sonra_tekrar_deneyi: An error has occurred, try again later...
bu_email_ile_kayitli_kullanici_yok: There are no registered users with this e-mail.
sifrenizi_yenilemek_icin_mail_adresinizi: Enter your e-mail address to reset your password.
sifre_sifirlama_maili_gonderildi: Password reset e-mail has been sent, you can reset your password from the sent e-mail.
uygulamayi_kullanabilmek_icin_dogrulama_: You must enter a verification code to use the application.
kayit_esnasinda_mail_adresinize_gonderil: Verify your account from the verification link sent to your e-mail address during registration...
logo_yukleme_mesaji: *** To upload a logo, click inside the designated area and select your logo. To change the selected logo, click on the image that appears in the same area again and select your logo. Click the "Remove Logo" button to completely cancel and remove the logo.
